main event: A sighting of a white spherical object with a bright white flashing light over Roslyn Harbor, Long Island, N.Y. on March 10, 1958.
interesting points: The object was observed for a duration of 2-3 minutes,The sighting occurred on a clear night with stars visible,The object's size was estimated to be approximately 50 to 60 feet in diameter,The observer was familiar with aircraft and noted there were no nearby aircraft in the vicinity,The object exhibited a very slow moving flight from west to east with no sound.
sighted object: a white spherical object with a bright flashing light
witness description: The observer is familiar with aircraft, gasoline engines, and is not excitable.
